function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on open windows for high ventilation rates","Impact":"Risk of increased exposure to outdoor contaminants and pathogens","Mitigation":"Use of air purification technology and filtration systems to reduce the risk of outdoor contaminants entering the building","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV-C light disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of preventive measures such as social distancing and mask-wearing","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementation of enhanced ventilation systems and air purification technologies to reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens","Technologies":"Ventilation systems with increased fresh air delivery, air purifiers, UV-C light disinfection systems","People":"General population, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Rise in COVID-19 cases after relaxation of preventive measures","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and potential strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Continued use of air purification technologies and ventilation strategies to reduce the concentration of pathogens in indoor environments","Technologies":"Air purifiers, increased ventilation, UV-C light disinfection systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, and facility managers"}]}
